title: Create basic login page
body: Implement a simple login.html with username/password fields. No styling required yet.

title: Fix home page redirect
body: Users with an active session should be sent to /home instead of /.

title: Add logout route
body: Add GET /logout that destroys the session and redirects to /login.

title: Set up basic folder structure
body: Ensure /server and /client exist with placeholder files.

title: Add README skeleton
body: Create top-level README with project purpose and quick-start instructions.
